page.title: Fujitsu F2MC Processor Options
page.subtitle: How would you like the Fujitsu F2MC processor module to analyze the input file?

checkbox.caption: Use macro instructions
checkbox.help:
If this option is on, IDA will try to combine several instructions into a macro instruction. For example,
sbbs data:7, $1 bra $2 $1: jmp LABEL $2:
will be replaced by
sbbs16 data:7, LABEL
